welcome.default:
- Use `/welcome` to see the current settings for the welcome module.
- Use `/welcome <on|off>` to enable or disable the welcome message.
welcome.set:
- Use `/welcome set` to change the current welcome message.
- Use `/welcome set default` to set the default welcome message.
welcome.show: - Use `/welcome show` to show the current welcome message.
welcome.delete_default: - Use `/welcome delete default <on|off>` to enable or disable automatic deletion for default welcome messages (`user joined the group`).

goodbye.default:
- Use `/goodbye` to see the current settings for the goodbye module.
- Use `/goodbye <on|off>` to enable or disable the goodbye message.
goodbye.set:
- Use `/goodbye set` to change the current goodbye message.
- Use `/goodbye set default` to set the default goodbye message.
goodbye.show: - Use `/goodbye show` to show the current goodbye message.
goodbye.delete_default: - Use `/goodbye delete default <on|off>` to enable or disable automatic deletion for default goodbye messages (`user left the group`).

language.default:
- Use `/language` to see the current language and the supported ones.
- Use `/language <language>` to change the current language.

help.default: - Use `/help <command>` to see the manual for that command.

admin.newrole: - Use `/newrole <name>` to create a new role.
admin.setrole: - Use `/setrole <id|username|mention> <name>` (or reply to a message without `<id|username|tag>`) to assign a role to the user.
admin.roles: - Use `/roles` to list the roles in this chat.

ids.id:
- Use `/id <username|mention>` (or reply to a message without `<username|mention>`) to get a user's ID.
- Use `/id` to get the chat's ID.
